messages.title: There's only two votes in it here
messages.content: The SNP won in North East Fife by just two votes last time. We can't let that happen again. That's why supporters of all parties are uniting behind Liberal Democrat Wendy Chamberlain to help her win this time.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Lib Dem Wendy Chamberlain can beat the SNP in North East Fife.

contactInformation.address: 10-12 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE. The Granary Business Centre, Coal Road, Cupar, Fife, KY15 5YQ. 7 Queen Street, Forfar, Angus, DD8 3JA.

endorsements.endorsement: I'm a lifelong Tory supporter but I realise to rid North East Fife of the SNP I must vote for Wendy Chamberlain. I would encourage all other Tory voters to do similar.

images.caption: 2017 General Election result in North East Fife

leaflet.additionalNotes: Published and promoted by D. L. Easton on behalf of Wendy Chamberlain (Scottish Liberal Democrats) at Unit G2, The Granary Business Centre, Coal Road, Cupar, Fife, KY15 5YQ and M. Dixon on behalf of the Liberal Democrats, 8-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE. Printed by Robertson Printers, 7 Queen Street, Forfar, Angus, DD8 3JA.
